name: Acarajé
description:
The costumers are hungering for Acarajé, and its your job to fulfill their needs!

In this cooking game, you must serve your clients with this traditional brazilian dish, making sure to be careful with each order specification. Three mistakes, and you are out!

Developers:

Rafael Vital @rafavla32

Tássio Miranda @isittacio

Danilo Ribeiro @scharma
